data.title: Firm Foundation (He Won't) by The Belonging Co
data.meta_description: Original Master MultiTracks, Charts, Patches, and instrument parts for rehearsal. View all products & resources available for "Firm Foundation (He Won't)" by The Belonging Co
data.text:
Chorus 1

Christ is my firm foundation

The Rock on which I stand

When everything around me is shaking

I've never been more glad

Chorus 2

That I put my faith in Jesus

Cause He's never let me down

He's faithful through generations

So why would He fail now

Turnaround

He won't He won't

Chorus 3

I've still got joy in chaos

I've got peace that makes no sense

So I won't be going under

I'm not held by my own strength

Chorus 4

Cause I build my life on Jesus

He's never let me down

He's faithful in every season

So why would He fail now

Refrain

He won't He won't

He won't fail

He won't fail

Christ is my firm foundation

The Rock on which I stand

When everything around me is shaking

I've never been more glad

Chorus 2

That I put my faith in Jesus

Cause He's never let me down

He's faithful through generations

So why would He fail now

Refrain

He won't He won't

He won't fail

He won't fail

Bridge

Rain came and wind blew

But my house was built on You

I'm safe with You

I'm gonna make it through

Tag

I'm gonna make it through

Cause I'm standing strong on You

Tag

I'm gonna make it through

Cause my house is built on You

Tag

I'm gonna make it through

Tag

My house is built on You
